Title: 5 Things Successful Interior Designers Do On Instagram

Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of having a strategy for Instagram success
Content.Text: Successful interior designers on Instagram have a clear strategy that includes knowing their ideal clients, planning content ahead, maintaining a cohesive visual theme, providing valuable content, and balancing promotion.
Consistent posting is crucial for Instagram success as it influences the algorithm and helps followers remember your brand.

Content.Knowledge Point: The role of valuable content in engagement and trust-building
Content.Text: Providing valuable content, such as design tips, how-to reels, and information-packed carousels, helps boost engagement and build trust in your business.

Content.Knowledge Point: Balancing promotion and keeping selling to a minimum
Content.Text: Direct promotion should not be the top priority on Instagram. Instead, focus on providing value and establishing trust through authentic and relatable content.
